sub_title: Client Partner (BFSI) at Tata Consultancy Services
summary:
Rahul has 10+ years of experience in Sales, Business Development and Key account management. Out of his careeer spanning 13+ years, for more than 10 years he has been involved in selling and delivering IT services to the banking and financial services clients in Continental Europe.

Over the past 10 years, Rahul has played various roles including that of Pre-sales and Solutioning lead, Relationship manager for global financial services group and Client Partner for international portfolio of a global bank etc.

Based out of continental Europe since 2015, he has excellent understanding of the business drivers and cultural & political dynamics of the markets. His educational background as a business administrator, multi-lingual skills and positive attitude towards problem solving & conflict resolution have been key to his success and establish himself as a result oriented leader

profile_positions.description: I spearhead the relationship of TCS with the French entity of a large global bank. In this role, I am responsible for strong & steady growth of the portfolio, nurturing and developing opportunities in strategic areas and associate engagement
profile_positions.title: Relationship Manager

profile_positions.description:
Key Responsibilities

-  Single point of contact for the relationship with the customer
-  Growth opportunity Identification, collaboration on key areas of growth
-  Increase participation of the larger TCS teams in the relationship to bring in increased visibility
-  Bring best practices from the global engagement with the bank for leveraging commonalities and to fulfill key priorities
profile_positions.title: Engagement Manager - Leading Direct Bank in France

profile_positions.description:
Key Responsibilities

-  Single point of contact for contract management and negotiations
-  Identification of focus areas for collaboration and designing roadmap for engagements
-  Scrum master for the Scaled Agile team for Enterprise Content Management (ECM)
profile_positions.title: Domain Manager & Scrum Master - Group Services Domain of the Global Bank

profile_positions.description:
Client Name	:  A global bank Head Quartered in Amsterdam

Key Activities

•	Responding to client requests: Responding to RFIs, RFPs, request for approach notes etc. interfacing with internal groups 
•       Due diligence for team sizing and effort estimation
•	Sales Support: Supporting sales and account teams in responding to general client queries about solutions and capabilities
•	Identifying new opportunities for TCS in both existing engagements and new ventures
•	Supporting client visits: Engaging with clients during their visits to Offshore locations 
•	Marketing support: Preparing marketing collateral to differentiate TCS from competitors
•	Improving the quality of proposals and marketing material with better presentation and attention to detail
profile_positions.title: Manager - Presales

profile_positions.description:
Human Resource Management System

Human resource management system implementation at Rural Development Department, Govt. of Maharashtra is being carried out in stages. Online Transfer and Leave modules were rolled out across the department for over a thousand employees. 

Key Activities

•	Understanding the existing manual transfer processing in the department 
•	Presenting the Online Transfer system to senior government officials inluding The Chief Minister of Maharashtra. 
•	Understanding leave rules and incorporation to the leave module
•	Study of the service book used to record the service details of the employees and design of an online version of the service book
profile_positions.title: Module Lead & Lead Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
E-District project is a national mission mode project initiated by Government of India. e-District project was conceptualized to improve and enhance the efficiencies of the various departments at the district-level to enable online service delivery to the citizen. TCS was selected as the implementing agency for 5 pilot districts.

Functioning as a Business Analyst, participated in the requirement gathering process and worked as a module lead in the project delivery team.

Key Activities

•	Interactions with the district administration and the project managers for requirement understanding and standardization of processes 
•	Review of the applications developed and presentation to the clients 
•	Co-ordination and conduction of training sessions senior government officials like District Collectors and Secretaries
•	Coordination with external entities for software quality certfication, integration with 3rd party solution etc
profile_positions.title: Module Lead & Lead Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Participated in a key role in the bidding processes for multiple opportunities in the public sector. Dealt with all the statutory requirements of a public sector procurement process

Scope: Proposals for Multiple Government Clients (Maharashtra)

Key Activities

• Responding to client requests: Responding to RFIs, RFPs, request for approach notes etc. interfacing with internal groups
• Sales Support: Supporting sales and account teams in responding to general client queries about solutions and capabilities
• Identifying new opportunities for TCS in both existing engagements and new ventures
profile_positions.title: Team Member - Bid Developent Team

profile_positions.description:
MahaOnline Ltd. is a Joint venture between TCS and Government of Maharashtra formed with the aim of providing citizen centric services online and facilitating paperless functioning of Mantralaya, the administrative head quarters of the state government.  

As a business analyst, interacted with the government employees, understanding the existing processes, suggesting improved processes, eventually leading to development of an improved online process

Modules Handled

DigiGov (Document Management System for Government of Maharashtra)
MahaOnline Portal (Citizen Centric Portal)
VPMS (Visitor Pass Management System) for Mantralaya
profile_positions.title: Module Lead - MahaOnline

volunteer_experiences.description: Taught English to high school students from underprivileged educational backgrounds. These classes were conducted on Sundays for 3 hours.
